org.apache.giraph.graph

类 GraphTaskManager<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.graph.GraphTaskManager<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex data
    E - Edge data
    M - Message data
    所有已实现的接口:
    ResetSuperstepMetricsObserver

    public class GraphTaskManager<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements ResetSuperstepMetricsObserver
    The Giraph-specific business logic for a single BSP compute node in whatever underlying type of cluster our Giraph job will run on. Owning object will provide the glue into the underlying cluster framework and will call this object to perform Giraph work.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String TIMER_COMMUNICATION_TIME
      Name of metric for time from first message till last message flushed
      static String TIMER_COMPUTE_ALL
      Name of metric for compute on all vertices in msec
      static String TIMER_SUPERSTEP_TIME
      Name of metric for superstep time in msec
      static String TIMER_TIME_TO_FIRST_MSG
      Name of metric for time from begin compute to first message sent

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      GraphTaskManager(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
      Default constructor for GiraphTaskManager.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void cleanup()
      Called by owner of this GraphTaskManager object on each compute node
      void determineClassTypes(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Set the concrete, user-defined choices about generic methods (validated earlier in GiraphRunner) into the Configuration.
      void execute()
      Perform the work assigned to this compute node for this job run. 1) Run checkpoint per frequency policy. 2) For every vertex on this mapper, run the compute() function 3) Wait until all messaging is done. 4) Check if all vertices are done.
      GraphFunctions getGraphFunctions()
      Get the worker function enum.
      MasterAggregatorUsage getMasterAggregatorUsage()
      Get master aggregator usage, a subset of the functionality
      WorkerContext getWorkerContext() 
      boolean isMaster()
      Get "isMaster" status flag -- we need to know if we're the master in the "finally" block of our GiraphYarnTask#execute() to commit final job output.
      void newSuperstep(SuperstepMetricsRegistry superstepMetrics)
      Starting a new superstep.
      void notifyFinishedCommunication()
      Notification of last message flushed.
      void notifySentMessages()
      Notification from Vertex that a message has been sent.

      Sets the "isMaster" flag for final output commit to happen on master.
      void setup(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path[] zkPathList)
      Called by owner of this GraphTaskManager on each compute node
      void workerFailureCleanup()
      Cleanup all of Giraph's framework-agnostic resources regardless of which type of cluster Giraph is running on.
      void zooKeeperCleanup()
      Cleanup a ZooKeeper instance managed by this GiraphWorker upon job run failure.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GraphTaskManager

        public GraphTaskManager(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
        Default constructor for GiraphTaskManager.
        参数:
        context - a handle to the underlying cluster framework. For Hadoop clusters, this is a Mapper#Context.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setup

        public void setup(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path[] zkPathList)
           throws IOException,
                  InterruptedException
        Called by owner of this GraphTaskManager on each compute node
        参数:
        zkPathList - the path to the ZK jars we need to run the job
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws IOException,
                    InterruptedException
        Perform the work assigned to this compute node for this job run. 1) Run checkpoint per frequency policy. 2) For every vertex on this mapper, run the compute() function 3) Wait until all messaging is done. 4) Check if all vertices are done. If not goto 2). 5) Dump output.
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • setIsMaster

        public void setIsMaster(boolean im)
        Sets the "isMaster" flag for final output commit to happen on master.
        参数:
        im - the boolean input to set isMaster. Applies to "pure YARN only"

      • isMaster

        public boolean isMaster()
        Get "isMaster" status flag -- we need to know if we're the master in the "finally" block of our GiraphYarnTask#execute() to commit final job output.
        返回:
        true if this task IS the master.

      • getGraphFunctions

        public GraphFunctions getGraphFunctions()
        Get the worker function enum.
        返回:
        an enum detailing the roles assigned to this compute node for this Giraph job.

      • getMasterAggregatorUsage

        public final MasterAggregatorUsage getMasterAggregatorUsage()
        Get master aggregator usage, a subset of the functionality
        返回:
        Master aggregator usage interface

      • getWorkerContext

        public final WorkerContext getWorkerContext()

      • determineClassTypes

        public void determineClassTypes(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Set the concrete, user-defined choices about generic methods (validated earlier in GiraphRunner) into the Configuration.
        参数:
        conf - the Configuration object for this job run.

      • newSuperstep

        public void newSuperstep(SuperstepMetricsRegistry superstepMetrics)
        从接口复制的说明: ResetSuperstepMetricsObserver
        Starting a new superstep. Re-initialize your metrics.
        指定者:
        newSuperstep 在接口中 ResetSuperstepMetricsObserver
        参数:
        superstepMetrics - SuperstepMetricsRegistry being used.

      • notifySentMessages

        public void notifySentMessages()
        Notification from Vertex that a message has been sent.

      • notifyFinishedCommunication

        public void notifyFinishedCommunication()
        Notification of last message flushed. Comes when we finish the superstep and are done waiting for all messages to send.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
             throws IOException,
                    InterruptedException
        Called by owner of this GraphTaskManager object on each compute node
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • zooKeeperCleanup

        public void zooKeeperCleanup()
        Cleanup a ZooKeeper instance managed by this GiraphWorker upon job run failure.

      • workerFailureCleanup

        public void workerFailureCleanup()
        Cleanup all of Giraph's framework-agnostic resources regardless of which type of cluster Giraph is running on.
